name: Pack Per Duck
description:
Ugly duckling came up with a brilliant plan. Ugly duckling decided to Rob a Bank.
I put on a bag and flew, but the bag flew off. He needs more packages to collect, so that his face could not be identified!

Pack per Duck-2d shooter with a change of weapons, go through various levels dodging mines, enemy bullets and suicide bombers, destroy levels, blow up everything around and at the end meet the great and terrible... a rubber duck!

Management:
WASD-Movement
Mouse wheel - change weapons
Left Mouse Button-Shooting
R-Recharge
F-Throw a grenade

Feature of game:
- Complexity
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
- Music
